about_the_game:
Welcome to Loop. Loop is a first-person comedy game centered around completing laps around a test track. Drawing inspiration from The Stanley Parable and Portal, Loop is a game that will leave players laughing and confused.

Based on the award-winning Ludum Dare 47 submission by the same name, Loop's full release offers players new hilarious content, bug fixes, and many quality of life updates.

What will happen to you in the Loop?

About the Game
